name: LEBENSHILFE
briefDescription: Lebenshilfe â€“ Visakhapatnam is a registered non-profit organization that strives to enrich the lives of people with intellectual and physical disabilities and increase their self-esteem, dignity, and quality of life, by providing opportunity for independent-living through imparting income-generating skills. Lebenshilfe aims to mitigate the emotional and financial burden of such helpless individuals and integrate them into mainstream society. All the services at Lebenshilfe are given free of cost, and since its inception, Lebenshilfe has expanded and grown many-fold in its services and the number of beneficiaries.
